name: Crime scene (itch) (Ju / smwhr)
description:
Crime scene is the binksi adaptation of the crime scene example found in ink's documentation.

The original ink script is almost unchanged and, most importantly the flow (always keeping a forward momentum) is faithfully reproduced.

Notable changes include :
- some choices are changed to tagged choices because they are an interaction with a physical object
- some choices are moved a level deeper in order to put them behind a tagged choice
- added some default choices to allow the player to walk around
- choice text is shortened to fit in the 40 characters limitation
- SPAWN_AT and CUTSCENE are sprinkled all over to give life to the scene
